bibl.title: From Greek to Latin Currency in Third-Century Egypt.
bibl.note: The traditional currency of Egypt came to an end in 295/6; the new currency was in existence by 296/7. - See pp. 161-163: The Date of Domitius Domitianus.

bibl.title: Mélanges de numismatique offerts à Pierre Bastien à l'occasion de son 75e anniversaire

bibl.seg: Metcalf William E., From Greek to Latin Currency in Third-Century Egypt.
Hélène Huvelin, Michel Christol et Georges Gautier (Édd.), Mélanges de numismatique offerts à Pierre Bastien à l'occasion de son 75e anniversaire (Wetteren, 1987) pp. 157-168, 2 tabl.
The traditional currency of Egypt came to an end in 295/6; the new currency was in existence by 296/7. - See pp. 161-163: The Date of Domitius Domitianus.
